ground_truth: Ron gasps as Hermione storms off, and Harry is walking up some steps. He reaches the top and bumps into Cho who has come around the corner. Ron is being helped into the room, looking shaky, and he shakes his head as the Patil twins walk past. Ron gets dressed in front of a mirror, looking panicked and uncomfortable in his ridiculous dress robes. Harry walks in dressed in a more conventional suit and sniffs at his clothes. Harry and Ron walk down the stairs into the hall, with Ron fidgeting with his outfit, and they approach the Patil twins. Hermione enters the room all dressed up, walks down the stairs, and Viktor Krum takes her hand as they walk together and dance. Soon others join in, including Dumbledore and McGonagall, Mr. Filch and his cat, and Hagrid and Madame Maxime, while Mad-Eye Moody sits on the sidelines drinking. The crowd is jumping, but Harry, Ron, and their dates sit some distance away looking miserable. Hermione comes up after a great time with Viktor and then walks off. Harry walks up, and he and Ron walk away. They return to the old house, where a sleeve is rolled up to reveal a marking of a skull and snake on the arm, and Harry wakes up. Floorboards creak as someone walks up to his bed, and he chuckles and dances off. Harry nods as he takes his clothes off and gets in the bath, with his golden egg on the side. The ghostly figure of little Myrtle flies around, gets in the water, and laughs, embarrassing Harry. Mad-Eye Moody appears in the doorway as Neville emerges from behind a bookcase. The Weasley twins shout and take bets as Harry walks along with Neville, carrying green plant life in hand. Harry puts the gillyweed in his mouth and starts choking when the cannon fires and the champions enter the water, with three diving in while Harry is pushed. Underwater, the effects of gillyweed take hold, making Harry's hands and feet webbed. Harry flies into the air like a dolphin to the crowd’s cheers, then swims among the fish and rocks, still searching. He finds Ron, Hermione, Cho Chang, and a blonde girl from Beauxbatons tied by their ankles. Cedric takes Cho with him, and Harry sets about freeing Ron and Hermione as vicious merpeople appear. What looks like a shark approaches at high speed, but it has legs, revealing it's Viktor, who takes Hermione and heads for the surface.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: Ron breathes sharply as Hermione marches off, and Harry is ascending some stairs. He arrives at the summit and collides with Cho who has turned around the corner. Ron is being assisted into the chamber, appearing unsteady, and he moves his head from side to side as the Patil twins stroll past. Ron dresses in front of a mirror, appearing terrified and uneasy in his absurd dress robes. Harry enters clad in a more traditional suit and inhales at his garments. Harry and Ron descend the steps into the hall, with Ron fiddling with his attire, and they approach the Patil twins. Hermione enters the chamber all adorned, descends the stairs, and Viktor Krum takes her hand as they proceed together and dance. Soon others join in, including Dumbledore and McGonagall, Mr. Filch and his feline, and Hagrid and Madame Maxime, while Mad-Eye Moody sits on the sidelines imbibing. The crowd is leaping, but Harry, Ron, and their partners sit some distance away appearing wretched. Hermione comes up after a splendid time with Viktor and then departs. Harry ascends, and he and Ron depart. They return to the old house, where a sleeve is rolled up to disclose a marking of a skull and serpent on the arm, and Harry awakens. Floorboards groan as someone approaches his bed, and he giggles and dances off. Harry nods as he disrobes and gets in the bath, with his golden egg on the edge. The spectral figure of little Myrtle flies around, enters the water, and laughs, mortifying Harry. Mad-Eye Moody appears in the doorway as Neville emerges from behind a bookcase. The Weasley twins yell and wager as Harry walks along with Neville, bearing verdant plant life in hand. Harry places the gillyweed in his mouth and begins choking when the cannon fires and the champions enter the water, with three diving in while Harry is shoved. Subaquatic, the effects of gillyweed take hold, making Harry's hands and feet webbed. Harry soars into the air like a dolphin to the crowd’s applause, then swims among the fish and stones, still seeking. He locates Ron, Hermione, Cho Chang, and a fair-haired girl from Beauxbatons bound by their ankles. Cedric takes Cho with him, and Harry sets about liberating Ron and Hermione as savage merpeople appear. What appears like a shark approaches at high velocity, but it has limbs, revealing it's Viktor, who takes Hermione and heads for the surface.

Harry, in a conventional suit, sniffs his clothes. They descend the stairs, Ron fidgeting, and approach the Patil twins. Hermione, dressed up, joins Viktor Krum to dance. Cedric takes Cho, and Harry frees Ron and Hermione as merpeople appear. Viktor, with shark legs, takes Hermione to the surface.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: Ron gasps audibly as Hermione storms off in a huff, leaving him behind, while Harry is seen walking up a set of steps. As he reaches the topmost step, he unexpectedly bumps into Cho, who has just come around the corner. Meanwhile, Ron is being assisted into the room, appearing quite shaky and unsteady, and he shakes his head in dismay as the Patil twins walk past him. Ron then gets dressed in front of a mirror, looking both panicked and uncomfortable in his rather ridiculous dress robes. Harry enters the room, dressed in a more conventional suit, and sniffs at his clothes with a hint of self-consciousness. Together, Harry and Ron walk down the stairs into the hall, with Ron fidgeting nervously with his outfit, and they approach the Patil twins. Hermione makes her entrance into the room, all dressed up elegantly, and walks down the stairs where Viktor Krum takes her hand. They walk together gracefully and begin to dance. Soon, others join in the dancing, including Dumbledore and McGonagall, Mr. Filch and his cat, and Hagrid and Madame Maxime, while Mad-Eye Moody sits on the sidelines, drinking and observing. The crowd is lively and jumping, but Harry, Ron, and their dates sit some distance away, looking rather miserable. After having a great time with Viktor, Hermione comes up and then walks off. Harry walks up to Ron, and together they walk away. They return to the old house, where a sleeve is rolled up to reveal a marking of a skull and snake on the arm, and Harry suddenly wakes up. The floorboards creak ominously as someone walks up to his bed, and he chuckles and dances off. Harry nods in acknowledgment as he takes his clothes off and gets into the bath, with his golden egg placed on the side. The ghostly figure of little Myrtle flies around playfully, gets into the water, and laughs, causing Harry to feel embarrassed. Mad-Eye Moody appears in the doorway just as Neville emerges from behind a bookcase. The Weasley twins shout excitedly and take bets as Harry walks along with Neville, carrying green plant life in hand. Harry puts the gillyweed into his mouth and starts choking just as the cannon fires, signaling the champions to enter the water, with three diving in while Harry is pushed. Underwater, the effects of the gillyweed take hold, transforming Harry's hands and feet to become webbed. Harry flies into the air like a dolphin to the crowd’s enthusiastic cheers, then swims among the fish and rocks, still searching diligently. He finds Ron, Hermione, Cho Chang, and a blonde girl from Beauxbatons tied by their ankles. Cedric takes Cho with him, and Harry sets about freeing Ron and Hermione as vicious merpeople appear menacingly. What looks like a shark approaches at high speed, but it has legs, revealing it's Viktor, who takes Hermione and heads for the surface.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description: Ron gasps audibly, expressing his surprise, as Hermione storms off in a huff, leaving him standing there, bewildered and alone, while Harry is seen walking up a set of steps with purpose. As he reaches the very topmost step, he unexpectedly bumps into Cho, who has just come around the sharp corner. Meanwhile, Ron is being assisted into the room by someone, appearing quite shaky and unsteady on his feet, and he shakes his head in dismay as the Patil twins walk past him with grace. Ron then finds himself getting dressed in front of a mirror, looking both panicked and uncomfortable in his rather ridiculous dress robes, which seem to add to his distress. Harry enters the room soon after, dressed in a more conventional suit, and sniffs at his clothes with a hint of self-consciousness and concern. Together, Harry and Ron proceed to walk down the stairs into the bustling hall, with Ron fidgeting nervously with his outfit, and they tentatively approach the Patil twins. Hermione makes her entrance into the room with elegance, all dressed up, and walks down the stairs where Viktor Krum takes her hand gallantly. They walk together gracefully and smoothly begin to dance. Soon, others join in the lively dancing, including Dumbledore and McGonagall, Mr. Filch and his cat, and the towering Hagrid and the elegant Madame Maxime, while Mad-Eye Moody sits on the sidelines, drinking and observing the festivities. The crowd is lively and jumping with energy, but Harry, Ron, and their dates sit some distance away, looking rather miserable and out of sorts. After having a great time dancing with Viktor, Hermione comes up to them and then decisively walks off. Harry walks up to Ron, and together they walk away. They return to the old house, where a sleeve is ominously rolled up to reveal a sinister marking of a skull and snake on the arm, and Harry suddenly wakes up with a start. The floorboards creak ominously as someone approaches his bed, and he chuckles and dances off with a sense of amusement. Harry nods in acknowledgment as he takes his clothes off and gets into the bath, with his golden egg placed securely on the side. The ghostly figure of little Myrtle flies playfully around, gets into the water with a splash, and laughs, causing Harry to feel quite embarrassed. Mad-Eye Moody appears in the doorway just as Neville emerges unexpectedly from behind a bookcase. The Weasley twins shout excitedly and take bets as Harry walks along with Neville, carefully carrying green plant life in hand. Harry puts the gillyweed into his mouth and starts choking just as the cannon fires, signaling the champions to enter the water, with three diving in gracefully while Harry is pushed unceremoniously. Underwater, the effects of the gillyweed take hold, transforming Harry's hands and feet, making them webbed and suited for swimming. Harry flies impressively into the air like a dolphin to the crowd’s enthusiastic cheers, then swims among the fish and rocks, still searching diligently. He finds Ron, Hermione, Cho Chang, and a blonde girl from Beauxbatons tied tightly by their ankles. Cedric takes Cho with him, and Harry sets about freeing Ron and Hermione as vicious merpeople appear menacingly. What looks like a shark approaches at high speed through the water, but it has legs, revealing it's Viktor, who takes Hermione and heads decisively for the surface.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: Ron gasps audibly, his eyes widening in surprise, as Hermione abruptly storms off, her footsteps echoing with determination. Meanwhile, Harry is ascending a set of steps, each footfall deliberate and steady. As he reaches the top, he unexpectedly collides with Cho, who has just turned the corner, their paths crossing in a moment of surprise. In another part of the scene, Ron is being assisted into a room, his movements unsteady and his demeanor shaky, as he shakes his head in a gesture of disbelief or disapproval while the Patil twins glide past him. Standing in front of a mirror, Ron hurriedly dresses, his expression a mix of panic and discomfort as he struggles with the absurdity of his dress robes. Harry enters the room, dressed in a more conventional suit, and takes a moment to sniff at his clothes, perhaps checking for freshness or scent. Together, Harry and Ron descend the stairs into the hall, with Ron continuously fidgeting with his outfit, adjusting and readjusting in an attempt to find some comfort. They approach the Patil twins, their steps measured and slightly hesitant. Hermione makes her entrance, elegantly dressed, and gracefully descends the stairs, where Viktor Krum awaits to take her hand. Together, they move to the dance floor, their movements synchronized as they begin to dance. Gradually, others join in the dance, including Dumbledore and McGonagall, Mr. Filch accompanied by his cat, and Hagrid with Madame Maxime, while Mad-Eye Moody remains on the sidelines, sipping his drink. The crowd is lively and animated, jumping to the rhythm, yet Harry, Ron, and their dates sit at a distance, their expressions marked by a shared sense of misery. After enjoying a wonderful time with Viktor, Hermione approaches the group, her face glowing with happiness, before she eventually walks off. Harry then steps forward, and he and Ron decide to leave, walking away together. They return to the old house, where a sleeve is carefully rolled up to reveal a sinister marking of a skull and snake on an arm, a sight that jolts Harry awake. The floorboards creak ominously as someone approaches his bed, and in a moment of levity, he chuckles and dances away. Harry nods in acknowledgment as he begins to undress, preparing to step into the bath, with his golden egg placed nearby. The ghostly figure of little Myrtle flits around the room, eventually joining him in the water, her laughter echoing and causing Harry a moment of embarrassment. Mad-Eye Moody appears in the doorway, his presence commanding, as Neville emerges from behind a bookcase, adding to the scene's intrigue. The Weasley twins shout energetically, taking bets as Harry walks alongside Neville, who is carrying green plant life in his hands. Harry places the gillyweed into his mouth, and as he begins to choke, the cannon fires, signaling the champions to enter the water. Three of them dive in with practiced ease, while Harry is unceremoniously pushed. Once underwater, the gillyweed's effects manifest, transforming Harry's hands and feet to become webbed. He propels himself into the air like a dolphin, drawing cheers from the crowd, before diving back into the water to swim among the fish and rocks, his eyes scanning the surroundings in search. He discovers Ron, Hermione, Cho Chang, and a blonde girl from Beauxbatons, all bound by their ankles. Cedric arrives and takes Cho with him, while Harry focuses on freeing Ron and Hermione. As he works, vicious merpeople appear, their presence menacing. Suddenly, what seems to be a shark approaches at high speed, but as it nears, it reveals legs, identifying it as Viktor, who swiftly takes Hermione and heads for the surface.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Ron gasps as Hermione storms off, while Harry ascends some steps and bumps into Cho at the top. Ron, looking shaky, is helped into a room where he dresses in front of a mirror, appearing panicked in his ridiculous dress robes. Harry enters in a conventional suit, sniffs his clothes, and they both head downstairs to the hall, with Ron fidgeting with his outfit as they approach the Patil twins. Hermione, elegantly dressed, descends the stairs, takes Viktor Krum's hand, and they dance together. Others, including Dumbledore, McGonagall, Mr. Filch with his cat, and Hagrid with Madame Maxime, join in, while Mad-Eye Moody observes from the sidelines. Despite the lively crowd, Harry, Ron, and their dates sit apart, looking miserable. After enjoying her time with Viktor, Hermione approaches and then leaves. Harry and Ron walk away, returning to an old house where a sleeve is rolled up to reveal a skull and snake marking, and Harry wakes up. Floorboards creak as someone approaches his bed, prompting Harry to chuckle and dance off. He nods, undresses, and gets into the bath with his golden egg nearby. Myrtle's ghostly figure flies around, joins him in the water, and laughs, embarrassing Harry. Mad-Eye Moody appears in the doorway as Neville emerges from behind a bookcase. The Weasley twins shout and take bets as Harry and Neville walk along, carrying green plant life. Harry consumes the gillyweed and starts choking as the cannon fires, signaling the champions to enter the water. Three dive in while Harry is pushed. Underwater, the gillyweed's effects manifest, webbing Harry's hands and feet. He leaps into the air like a dolphin to the crowd’s cheers, then swims among fish and rocks, searching. He discovers Ron, Hermione, Cho Chang, and a blonde girl from Beauxbatons tied by their ankles. Cedric retrieves Cho, and Harry begins freeing Ron and Hermione as vicious merpeople appear. A shark-like figure approaches rapidly, revealing itself as Viktor, who takes Hermione and heads for the surface.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: Ron gasps as Hermione storms off in frustration over an argument about their studies, and Harry is walking up some steps inside Hogwarts, the ancient castle that serves as their school. He reaches the top and bumps into Cho, his Quidditch crush, who has come around the corner. Ron is being helped into the room, looking shaky from an earlier encounter with a magical creature, and he shakes his head as the Patil twins, Padma and Parvati, walk past. Ron gets dressed in front of a mirror, looking panicked and uncomfortable in his ridiculous dress robes that were passed down from his older brothers due to his family's financial constraints. Harry walks in dressed in a more conventional suit, a gift from his late godfather Sirius Black, and sniffs at his clothes. Harry and Ron walk down the enchanted staircase into the grand hall, with Ron fidgeting with his outfit, and they approach the Patil twins, their reluctant dates for the evening. Hermione enters the room all dressed up in an elegant gown, a departure from her usual school robes, walks down the stairs, and Viktor Krum, the famous Bulgarian Quidditch Seeker and a guest at Hogwarts, takes her hand as they walk together and dance. Soon others join in, including Dumbledore, the esteemed headmaster known for his wisdom, and Professor McGonagall, the stern yet fair deputy headmistress, as well as Mr. Filch, the school's caretaker infamous for his dislike of students, and his cat, Mrs. Norris, and Hagrid, the gentle giant and gamekeeper, and Madame Maxime, the statuesque headmistress of Beauxbatons. Meanwhile, Mad-Eye Moody, the paranoid ex-Auror tasked with security, sits on the sidelines drinking. The crowd is jumping to the lively music, but Harry, Ron, and their dates sit some distance away looking miserable, longing for the fun that seems out of reach. Hermione comes up after a great time with Viktor, beaming with joy, and then walks off. Harry walks up, disappointment clouding his face, and he and Ron walk away. They return to the old house, a place filled with dark memories of Voldemort's rise, where a sleeve is rolled up to reveal a marking of a skull and snake, the Dark Mark, on the arm, and Harry wakes up from the disturbing dream. Floorboards creak as someone walks up to his bed, and he chuckles and dances off to release the tension. Harry nods as he takes his clothes off and gets in the bath, with his golden egg, a clue for the Triwizard Tournament he's competing in, on the side. The ghostly figure of Moaning Myrtle, who haunts the bathroom since her untimely death decades ago, flies around, gets in the water, and laughs, embarrassing Harry. Mad-Eye Moody appears in the doorway, his magical eye seeing through walls, as Neville emerges from behind a bookcase, having spent hours studying Herbology. The Weasley twins, Fred and George, known for their prankster spirit, shout and take bets as Harry walks along with Neville, carrying gillyweed, a magical plant that allows underwater breathing, in hand. Harry puts the gillyweed in his mouth and starts choking when the cannon fires to signal the start of the competition, and the champions enter the water, with three diving in while Harry is pushed, unprepared. Underwater, the effects of gillyweed take hold, making Harry's hands and feet webbed like a fish's, a temporary transformation essential for his task. Harry flies into the air like a dolphin, a surprising spectacle to the crowd’s cheers, then swims among the fish and rocks, still searching for the hostages he must rescue. He finds Ron, Hermione, Cho Chang, and a blonde girl from Beauxbatons tied by their ankles as part of the challenge. Cedric takes Cho with him, showcasing his leadership, and Harry sets about freeing Ron and Hermione as vicious merpeople, guardians of the deep, appear. What looks like a shark approaches at high speed, but it has legs, revealing it's Viktor in a transformed state, who takes Hermione and heads for the surface to complete his own task.

In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. The ghostly figure of little Myrtle flies around gets in the water and laughs embarrassing Harry. MadEye Moody appears in the doorway as Neville emerges from behind a bookcase. The Weasley twins shout and take bets as Harry walks along with Neville carrying green plant life in hand. Harry puts the gillyweed in his mouth and starts choking when the cannon fires and the champions enter the water with three diving in while Harry is pushed Underwater. the effects of gillyweed take hold making Harry's hands and feet webbed. Harry flies into the air like a dolphin to the crowd’s cheers then swims among the fish and rocks still searching. He finds Ron Hermione Cho Chang and a blonde girl from Beauxbatons tied by their ankles. Cedric takes Cho with him and Harry sets about freeing Ron and Hermione as vicious merpeople appear. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. They return to the old house where a sleeve is rolled up to reveal a marking of a skull and snake on the arm and Harry wakes up. Floorboards creak as someone walks up to his bed and he chuckles and dances off. Harry nods as he takes his clothes off and gets in the bath with his golden egg on the side. The ghostly figure of little Myrtle flies around gets in the water and laughs embarrassing Harry. MadEye Moody appears in the doorway as Neville emerges from behind a bookcase. The Weasley twins shout and take bets as Harry walks along with Neville carrying green plant life in hand. Harry puts the gillyweed in his mouth and starts choking when the cannon fires and the champions enter the water with three diving in while Harry is pushed Underwater. the effects of gillyweed take hold making Harry's hands and feet webbed. Harry flies into the air like a dolphin to the crowd’s cheers then swims among the fish and rocks still searching. He finds Ron Hermione Cho Chang and a blonde girl from Beauxbatons tied by their ankles. Cedric takes Cho with him and Harry sets about freeing Ron and Hermione as vicious merpeople appear. What looks like a shark approaches at high speed but it has legs revealing it is Viktor who takes Hermione and heads for the surface.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~50%)
test_cases.description: Ron gasps as Hermione storms off and Harry is walking up some steps. He reaches the top and bumps into Cho who has come around the corner. Ron is being helped into the room looking shaky and he shakes his head as the Patil twins walk past. Ron gets dressed in front of a mirror looking panicked and uncomfortable in his ridiculous dress robes. Harry walks in dressed in a more conventional suit and sniffs at his clothes. Harry and Ron walk down the stairs into the hall with Ron fidgeting with his outfit and they approach the Patil twins. Harry puts the gillyweed in his mouth and starts choking when the cannon fires and the champions enter the water with three diving in while Harry is pushed Underwater. the effects of gillyweed take hold making Harry's hands and feet webbed. Harry flies into the air like a dolphin to the crowd’s cheers then swims among the fish and rocks still searching. He finds Ron Hermione Cho Chang and a blonde girl from Beauxbatons tied by their ankles. Cedric takes Cho with him and Harry sets about freeing Ron and Hermione as vicious merpeople appear. What looks like a shark approaches at high speed but it has legs revealing it is Viktor who takes Hermione and heads for the surface.

test_cases.name: Deletion (~80%)
test_cases.description: Ron gasps as Hermione storms off and Harry is walking up some steps. He reaches the top and bumps into Cho who has come around the corner. Ron is being helped into the room looking shaky and he shakes his head as the Patil twins walk past. Cedric takes Cho with him and Harry sets about freeing Ron and Hermione as vicious merpeople appear. What looks like a shark approaches at high speed but it has legs revealing it is Viktor who takes Hermione and heads for the surface.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: Luna yawns as Neville drifts by, and Draco is sliding down some rails. He descends the bottom and collides with Ginny who has moved through the archway. Luna is being guided into the zone, appearing jittery, and she nods her head as the Creevey siblings skip past. Luna gets dressed in front of a window, feeling ecstatic and confident in her astonishing tuxedo. Draco slides in dressed in a less traditional gown and sniffs at his shoes. Draco and Luna slide up the escalator into the field, with Luna adjusting her hat, and they approach the Creevey siblings. Neville enters the zone all spruced up, slides up the escalator, and Bellatrix Lestrange takes his elbow as they slide together and skip. Eventually, others join in, including Snape and Pomfrey, Mr. Filch and his owl, and Grawp and Madame Pomfrey, while Lucius Malfoy lounges on the bench reading. The audience is rolling, but Draco, Luna, and their companions crouch a fair distance nearby looking jubilant. Neville comes over after an awful time with Bellatrix and then collapses. Draco slides over, and he and Luna shuffle away. They return to the ancient castle, where a sock is pulled down to reveal a tattoo of a rose and lioness on the leg, and Draco dozes off. Owls hoot as someone skips up to his couch, and he giggles and strolls off. Draco blinks as he throws his hat away and climbs in the shower, with his silver apple on the floor. The shadowy silhouette of young Myrtle swims around, leaps in the steam, and cries, amusing Draco. Lucius Malfoy appears in the archway as Seamus emerges from under a wardrobe. The Peverell siblings whisper and give advice as Draco slides around with Seamus, holding blue fruit in hand. Draco places the seaweed in his pocket and starts laughing when the trumpet sounds and the competitors exit the forest, with three gliding away while Draco is pulled. Overground, the effects of seaweed kick in, making Draco’s ears and nose gigantic. Draco bounds to the moon like a kangaroo to the crowd’s boos, then dances among the butterflies and mountains, still hiding. He discovers Luna, Neville, Ginny Weasley, and a red-haired boy from Ilvermorny knotted by their wrists. Cedric grabs Ginny with him, and Draco sets about hiding Luna and Neville as playful elves appear. What resembles a dragon approaches at low speed, but it has arms, revealing it's Bellatrix, who grabs Neville and heads for the tunnel.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Harry encounters Cho at the top of the stairs while Ron, feeling uneasy in his dress robes, is assisted into the room. Dressed in a suit, Harry sniffs his clothes before they descend the stairs with Ron fidgeting with his outfit. Hermione arrives beautifully dressed, joins Viktor Krum, and they dance. Others join in, but Harry, Ron, and their dates sit apart looking unhappy. After Hermione leaves with Viktor, Harry and Ron walk away. They return to an old house, revealing a skull and snake mark on an arm before Harry wakes up. As floorboards creak, Harry gets into the bath with his golden egg, embarrassed by Myrtle’s ghostly laughter. Mad-Eye Moody and Neville appear, and Harry eats gillyweed. When the cannon fires, Harry enters the water, and the gillyweed takes effect, webbing his hands and feet. Harry swims like a dolphin, finds his friends tied underwater, and Cedric takes Cho. Harry frees Ron and Hermione, battles merpeople, and Viktor, in a shark form, rescues Hermione.
